It's a good competitive game, BUT.

1. New players start in low trust factor (lowest to be exact), WTF VALVE? 
2. Too many cheaters, especially without prime, they ruined the game when they made it free.
3. Even if you get prime, you're still in lowest trust factor, equals again - cheaters..


EDIT: Changed my mind. Every single game - a cheater! Don't play this garbage until they figure out to fight cheaters.
Lots of sweaty try-hards, Man I hate the hackers...
